clients.title: Do Good by Doing Good: Increase Your Exposure to Prospective Clients With Justia Ask a Lawyer
description: Justia Ask A Lawyer is an online platform where legal consumers post basic legal questions and receive free answers from participating attorneys. Answering these questions allows you to earn points and get noticed by prospective clients in our Ask a Lawyer legal practice area forums. In turn, point leaders appear and are featured on highlighted leaderboards across the Justia site. Participating attorneys receive an email in real time when a question is submitted in their chosen practice areas and localities. Be the first to answer a question and earn more points!
Make sure to check your Justia subscriptions to ensure you are receive questions in the practice areas that are relevant to you. Log in here: https://answers.justia.com/subscriptions
